Question
========

In the S3 system, a generic function works by examining the [[1]] of its first argument, and then dispatching the corresponding [[2]].

Which ordered pair of words replaces [[1]] and [[2]] to best complete the sentence?

Answerlist
----------
* class, method
* method, class
* argument, function
* function, method
* function, class

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* No, arguments don't have methods.
* No, arguments don't have arguments.
* No, arguments don't have functions.
* No, arguments don't have functions.
